text:
Summary



Reliance Communications says merger with Aircel ‘lapsed with mutual consent’ Dr. Reddy’s launched Renvela’s generic version in the U.S. markets GMR Infra to raise up to Rs 2,500 crore via securities’ issue Greenko made $2.1 billion bid for Reliance Infra’s Mumbai power business Power Grid entered into a term loan agreement for Rs 3,270 crore with ICICI Bank Indiabulls Ventures to raise Rs 2,000 crore via rights issue






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India gained 0.2 percent to 9,859 as of 7:30 am.





All you need to know going into trade today.https://t.co/fT4Vi2kcxk pic.twitter.com/3uPtnIB4Xf— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) October 3, 2017






Here are the stocks to watch out for in today’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Dr. Reddy’s Labs, Reliance Communications, GMR Infra, Power Grid
